plot: Swiss-Tibetan actress & host Yangzom Brauen invites 6 passionate 'dreamers' to move to Hollywood for 6 months and give it a shot.
plot_en: Swiss-Tibetan actress & host Yangzom Brauen invites 6 passionate 'dreamers' to move to Hollywood for 6 months and give it a shot.
plot_es: Swiss-Tibetan actress & host Yangzom Brauen invites 6 passionate 'dreamers' to move to Hollywood for 6 months and give it a shot.
title: Hallo Hollywood
